short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show your support with the GOPbook plugin for Facebook!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GOPbook is an extension for Facebook that lets you show your support for the Republican party by modifying the design and color scheme of Facebook pages. It can be enabled and disabled at any time and includes options to add a direct link to GOP.com to your Facebook pages as well as a GOP-themed background.

Please be aware that this is still a pre-release (think beta) version and we plan on adding features and bug fixes in the near future!
